entry.def: Reservists are soldiers who are not serving in the regular army of a country, but who can be called to serve whenever they are needed.

means.word_mean: 1. a member of a military reserve

auth_sentence.content: He became the first reservist to hold the position of director of Reserve Forces and Cadets.
auth_sentence.res_content: He became the first reservist to hold the position of director of Reserve Forces and Cadets.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He became the first reservist to hold the position of director of Reserve Forces and Cadets.

auth_sentence.content: But the threat of nuclear weapons changed his mind, and he served in the Marine Corps as a reservist.
